website_summaries.verdict: A very basic mini music player that babies and toddlers can't seem to resist. Incredibly affordable fun for smaller children.
pros: 4 classical tunes accompanied by colorful lights make for engaging entertainment
Large center button allows little ones to easily change songs
cons: Button needs to be pressed at the end of each song for it to play the next – a feature that toddlers enjoy but can frustrate smaller babies

website_summaries.verdict: A favorite among babies, toddlers, and parents, this portable music toy keeps little ones entertained on the go or at home. Loads of baby-friendly features for a low price.
pros: Features lights, 7 classical melodies, and an easy to press button for little ones to choose their favorite tune
Chunky design and large button is easy for babies to handle
Volume control allows babies to enjoy their music without driving parents crazy
cons: Large beads on the handle can make it difficult for young babies to hold with one hand

customer_reviews.title: Great tunes for Little Ones!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute toy- perfect for my music loving little nephew. It's light, easy for little hands to hold, and has a sturdy feel to it. Parents will appreciate that there is a volume control as well. I can't wait to give it to him tomorrow! The video I took shows how the beads on the handle move, and demonstrates some of the different tunes.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Paint
customer_reviews.text: Received the item promptly. However, color paint smeared all over when wiping it with a wet towel. I sure hope it isn't toxic, and I'm glad I found out before letting our child play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: Edit:This is, unfortunately, a crappy knock off. Buy it in an actual store.
customer_reviews.text: I just bought another of these from Target and the one I bought on here is DEFINITELY a knockoff. The music plays faster than it's supposed to, more frantically. The one I got from Target today does not have that tinny quality to the sound, the music is rich and full like the old one my oldest child had. I wish I'd compared this one to one from Target earlier so that I could've returned it. I've hated this thing from day one. The tinny, rattling sound makes me grit my teeth every time it comes on. Hopefully neither of my girls will notice that I switched it out.
customer_reviews.author: redhead_chameleon

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson when he was an infant. Small enough, easy to hold. He’s now 4 years old and still likes it!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Didn't seem much of a good toy... at first.
customer_reviews.text: Just amazing. Daughter won't stop staring at it when lights and music are on. She enjoys it so much. It saved us from so many hours or crying and fuzziness, specially in the so-much-hated car seat. And we thought at first that it wouldn't be so good! It has nice songs too and even my wife and I like it. I think the key to entertain our baby was that the lights are synchronized with the music.
customer_reviews.author: Chema

customer_reviews.title: Three Grandkids, Three music boxes!
customer_reviews.text: My first purchase was 8 years ago. She LOVED it as did parents. Quality sound, volume settings, teaches cause & affect. Parents went through 2 battery changes in 4+ years... then given to friend. Second purchase, 5 years ago. It had to go everywhere she went for at least 3 years, maybe more. Third purchase 1 year ago to grandchild of classical musician parents; he loves it, they love it...the music box seems indestructible.
customer_reviews.author: Pamalama

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for car rides too!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the first toys our son showed interest in as an infant. He is now 18 mo old and still plays with it... now, he presses the button and dances along with the music. It's also very convenient because you can bring it into the car and it entertains kids on car rides, even at night because it lights up to the music. Update: We are on child #2 and this toy is still going strong after 2.5 years (although the sticker is finally wearing off). Our second child is 4 months old and we use it in the car to calm him when he is crying. He likes the music and the colorful lights.
customer_reviews.author: mkysayTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Product is filthy!
customer_reviews.text: I literally just received this product, and there is what looks to be mold on the actual product itself. I attempted whipping the packaging, and these marks still remained. Very disapointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: AlexisMW

customer_reviews.title: Hazard! Parents need to be aware of the paper button!
customer_reviews.text: At this age, the baby especially likes to bite a variety of things and drool like crazy. But this toy is definitely not a good teething toy. The paper on the top of the button has fallen off because of the saliva! I highly doubt that my baby has eaten a lot of paper.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn11

customer_reviews.title: definitely easy to wipe it down
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Battery comes with the product, definitely easy to wipe it down, (I'm a germaphobe :)). My son enjoys pushing the button to hear different sounds, lights definitely entertain him as well. This is the toy that I keep in the car at all times :).
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Toy for Our Newborn
customer_reviews.text: Really a great toy for a very young baby and probably up into 6 months or a year, maybe beyond that. Our newborn just hit 4 weeks and he loves the sounds of it when getting diaper changed; or when relaxing in his swing and/or crib. Remember parents - most pediatricians recommend children should not be exposed to TV or TV dialogue and background (many parents are unaware of this) until 2 years of age or older. Toys such as this are a great segway until they reach an appropriate age to view TV or other devices. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my firstborn 6 years ago and she loved it and still using it once in a while when she sees her baby sister playing with it. We use it at home, in a car or strapping it to stroller while out and about. It has different tunes/sounds and lights, kids don't seem to be tired of it and most importantly I don't get annoyed by its sounds Watch your tiny ones while they play with it as their coordination is not good and they will smack themselves with it... ouch
customer_reviews.author: Live, love, laugh 🖖Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Button doesn’t work properly.
customer_reviews.text: I would give 5 stars but we received a defected one. I have to press the button for my daughter because it’s too hard to press. It doesn’t even work everytime I press it. She loves the lights and music but it’s oretty useless since she can’t play with it on her own like in the car seat which is why I bought it. I found out from others that theirs works properly and is easy to press. I just assumed they were all like that until I saw for myself that the one I received is defective.
customer_reviews.author: DNel

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of a review I read. The songs are wonderful! Hearing them repeatedly is not as irritating as some other infant toys. I love the volume control in that I can choose how loud the music is played. The lights are a nice attraction. However...a teether??? Babies put everything in their mouths. This is HARD plastic! It would have been a more appropriate teether if the handle were soft an pliable or another part was soft...like the beads.
customer_reviews.author: R.B. Kealey

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy for my baby because I wanted something that would play music and be somewhat interactive. While the volume of it is nice, I don't really like that the music stops after every song. Instead we need to keep pressing the middle button to play another. Also, mid song, if my baby presses the middle, the song immediately switches to the next. I wish there was an option to have the songs just repeat and rotate on its own, or switch whenever you press the middle button. As for teething...my baby doesn't really find this toy that interesting for teething purposes. He just likes the flashing lights.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lee

customer_reviews.title: A FAVORITE of my Grandson!
customer_reviews.text: I was a tad bit disappointed at the short length of each recording, but my 18 month old grandson definitely gives this toy FIVE stars. He seemed to enjoy it when he was much younger, but now he often pulls it out of his toy basket and plays the music, pressing the button himself. He dances to the music on occasion. I have also noticed that this is a favorite of his Mommy to tuck into the diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Woodman

customer_reviews.title: Boring :-/
customer_reviews.text: Don't understand those 5 star reviews. This toy is very boring. I wish I watched the review/videos before buying it 😳 One button and a few melodies... 👎🏻 All toys have melodies, but they at least have more buttons... (Speaker is really bad in that toy)
customer_reviews.author: M&P 125

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping little ones calm
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think this toy would get much play but it was definitely one of the best purchases we made when our oldest was still a baby. She loved this toy! She loved to shake it and chew on the handle, and was always pressing the button for more songs. It was perfect for car rides too, we could just give it to her and she would calm down immediately. We've had this toy for about 6 years now, so my youngest was able to get some play out of it too before the batteries finally went out last year.
customer_reviews.author: TiffanyAndHusband

customer_reviews.title: This is probably the best toy I bought for my baby
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for him when he was a newborn and he is 7 months now and still loves the thing. He thought it was funny as a newborn, certain songs he'd smile and giggle for. Now he likes chewing on it and pushing the button himself. 7 months of entertainment so far, very worth it haha. And the batteries haven't died on me yet, surprisingly. The songs do go a bit out of order now, but hey, that just keeps it interesting. Definitely recommend it, one of the few musical toys that didn't get grading to listen to over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Neil Robertson

customer_reviews.title: This was/is terrible. It was shipped in the ON mode
customer_reviews.text: This was/is terrible. It was shipped in the ON mode,so the music was playing during travel,using battery life. Second, the speaker sounds like it is blown, so the music is crackly. The only thing I DO like is its compact size. Very disappointed,because it had great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and speaker on the back of the toy make it hard to here the music while it s on the floor
customer_reviews.text: I got this toy as It has very good reviews. In general, it s a nice to, however there are couple things that it won’t get 5 starts. First, it s a bit heavy for babies, it s hard for babies around 4 5 or less hold it in their hands. Second negative part, the speaker is at the back of the toy, so when you put the toy on the floor, you barely can hear the music even with high volume.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 Months daughter, now she’s on the time eating everything she can catch, so The most important thing I care about is quantity of her toys, the little phone it smells ok, and it can play different types music, my daughter likes it. but I think the light has a little bit shine to baby’s eyes. If you worry about it you can cover the light with some paper and tape
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: the round sticker on the button is pretty beat up
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this toy. I bought it for her when she was 4 months old. She is almost 6 months now and still loves it. She loves to chew on it. Unfortunately, she's dropped it so many times it's broken! At first it would start playing music by itself randomly. Then it started working normally again and playing music if you pressed the button. Now it's completely dead. Also, after numerous times wiping this toy down, the round sticker on the button is pretty beat up. Wish it was more durable, but maybe it would have to be built like a tank then. Since it's rather inexpensive, I'm buying her another one.
customer_reviews.author: a.y.ko

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one to replace an older model of the same thing. The older model survived two children and broke with the third because it went into the toilet. Bad baby put it in there. Anyway this newer model appeared cheap when we opened the package. I thought well, maybe it only looks cheaper than the previous one. Wrong, it lasted less than one month and did not go into the toilet! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: The perfect toy
customer_reviews.text: Most toys just play a few seconds of music. This actually plays good long sections of various compositions by Vivaldi, Chopin, Rossini, and Mozart. You actually hear enough of the song to learn the canonical passages of each piece. I've never seen that before in a baby toy. It was surprising how much of the songs are played. Very durable, very good sound quality for a baby toy. This is a perfect toy. My daughter loved it at 1, 2, and 3. Even at four, she'll still sometimes play the music.
customer_reviews.author: Peter NYC

customer_reviews.title: Good toy but sticker rubs off easily
customer_reviews.text: So, I was really excited to get this product and it works great but my problem is the circular sticker on the button. The developer didn't think about how much babies drool and how toys need to be wiped off. Instead of coloring the plastic, they used a multicolored sticker where you press to make the toy play music. So after my son's first drooling play session, I wiped off the toy, and half the sticker rubbed of with it. 😔 very disappointing... my son still loves the toy but I think the developers should consider changing the sticker to colored plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Toy for a baby
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my (now) 4 month old grandson when he first came home from the hospital, at 2 months old (many health issues including open heart surgery & other major problems). He's got one VERY underdeveloped optic nerve, which makes focusing extremely difficult. The brightly colored lights catch his attention quickly. Also, he definitely prefers Classical music to anything else; especially Beethoven, Vivaldi & Mozart. Luckily, the musical choices carry all 3 of his favs. I couldn't have designed a more perfect toy.
customer_reviews.author: Barb the Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: The button is extremely hard to push
customer_reviews.text: It isn't very baby friendly when they can't turn it on! I though it was just ours, so when I saw this item in a store I tried it there as well. The difficult button is on each one, not just my daughters. She loves the music, but it quickly went to goodwill because it pissed her off so much that she never got the music to play on her own and by the time she would have been old enough to do it herself it would have been to young of a toy. Great idea, but make it to where I one year old can actually make it work.
customer_reviews.author: Lorri

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: All 4 of my kids loved this I actually own 2. They fought over it so I bought a second one. I gift this to all new parents in my life and I always see their kids with it. It’s sturdy and can handle a toddler chewing on it but it is not a tether. The button is easy to work and all my kids operated it easily. The sound volume isn’t as easy to adjust which is great cause then then babies don’t accidentally blast it😜
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Muffled sound on soft surfaces
customer_reviews.text: The toy has a good variety of sounds and is attractive as well as inexpensive. However due to a design flaw it sounds very muffled when placed on a soft surface( like an activity mat). This happens because the speakers are on the back of the toy. The toy sounds just fine lying on its front but then the baby does not get to see the flashing lights:/ I have attached a video, please excuse the baby’s grunting
customer_reviews.author: silver7

customer_reviews.title: Small and cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 6mo old granddaughter. Brought instant smile to her face. Tunes definitely play a bit fast and are higher pitched than I expected. But still a great toy. She doesn’t seem to care and the volume control is perfect. The lights are an added bonus. Colors did not bleed as with some other reviews. Easy to grab and hold, Tactil beads, color, lights, sound, and something to suck on. For the price... a bargain toy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One song at a time, but baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: My 3 month old loves this toy! The music captures her attention for 10 minutes or more at a time but she hasny learned how to push the button to carry on to the next song yet. The music only lasts for one song, I dislike that, I wish it went on a little longer so it was less parent-interactive. I'm sure she will start to hit the music button on her own but right now once a song is over she CRIES until I hit the button for the next song. The light feature also keeps her attention. I love this toy but I'd like the songs to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome baby shower gift!
customer_reviews.text: Both of my babies love this! It's not too loud but keeps my babies interested enough so I used to use it when they started to fuss. Now I buy this for a baby shower gift and I hope new Moms are enjoying as much as I did. I think it is a cute and not too obnoxious sound baby toy!
customer_reviews.author: Sukisuki

customer_reviews.title: It's too heavy to hold for baby by themself! ...
customer_reviews.text: It's too heavy to hold for baby by themself! And the song plays short n my baby can't even play with this because that balls are very hard to bite/hard to roll. My baby got hurt on his front head from this toy! Idk why this is so popular. Very dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: ES&Andy

customer_reviews.title: Best baby gift
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to item for a baby gift. I have purchased 6 so far! This was my son’s favorite toy as a baby/toddler. Even before he was able to push the button. He used to do the sign for “please” to me so I could push it for him. Once his fingers were strong enough to push it by himself, he was listening to it non-stop in our car. I love the fact that it plays classical music and not baby songs.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Volume wasn’t as quite as loud as I would have liked but for a 10 month old I’m sure it will be fine. I like this a lot! They haven’t been to visit from out of state since I’ve started putting together a toy box so I’m excited to see if he likes his toys Grandma & Grandpa have collected and looking forward to playing with these toys with him!
customer_reviews.author: Jeri D.

customer_reviews.title: Baby's favorite toy - highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a gift when my baby was born; this turned out to be his favorite toy. It was one of the few things that calmed him down and helped to distract him when he became fussy / hysterical. The music is quite soothing and the colors fun! He loves this toy so much we purchased a second one to keep around the house in case the first is in his crib / stroller / under the couch (new parents will know what I'm talking about).
customer_reviews.author: Edward N.

customer_reviews.title: Baby's Dream Come True
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for my Grandson when he was born. One for his house and one for mine. This toy has soothed him since birth. He now carries it around everywhere and pushes the button and holds up to his ear to hear. The toy has two volume levels, and off option and is extremely durable. It does not play continuously without stopping, but part of the fun and learning process for him is pushing the button. We have yet to replace the batteries and it is played constantly. Just purchased a third for a trip to CA to meet his Great Grandmother and other family.
customer_reviews.author: Deane

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a 2 month old
customer_reviews.text: My 2 month old loves this thing! She’s starting to be more interested in things so I ordered several toys from amazon to occupy her. This by far is her favorite. She loves the music and lights. It’s not easy to find things for a 2 month old to play with and enjoy as they are still so young, but this is definitely a winner. If you’re looking for a toy for your young baby I definitely recommend this one. I also think it will continue to be fun as she ages.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, but paper sticker gets eaten
customer_reviews.text: The middle button has a paper sticker on it. My son managed to completely scratch it off with his teeth. I just don’t like my baby eating paper. Still giving it 4 starts instead of 1, because otherwise the toy is great. The toy is perfect size to grasp, and can be carried around. My 10 month old dances to it and goes back to playing with it after bigger and more complicated toys. Just maybe remove that sticker before giving it to your child.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect music toy
customer_reviews.text: I love the super simple design of this toy- bright and interesting but one large button to operate, making it easy for little hands to figure out. Plays excerpts of several different tunes, I really like that the clips it plays are a bit longer than most toys, I don’t have to constantly hit the button again (and the rotation of several songs means I don’t get burnt out hearing the same tune on repeat constantly). Overall would certainly buy this again; in fact I wish they had one with a bit of a different design that played a different rotation of songs so we could have two!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Agee

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't understand why such a simple little toy had such great reviews but I figured it was worth a shot. I'm so glad I got it!! My 6 month old baby LOVES it! She will sit with me and play with it for a while - longer than all her other toys. She really enjoys the lights and I appreciate the volume control option. The music is pleasant and the music button is easy for her to tap. I think it would be nice if the rings on the worm had a greater range - they only move up and down about half an inch. But baby is not complain so whatever!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Toy
customer_reviews.text: I accidently bumped the button when I was pulling out of the plastic wrap and it started. It would be easy for a baby to tap or push the buttons to start the music. The music stops on its own so it does not keep going, unless you push a button. The loudness is perfect as well, not to loud for the baby and you can hear it. I loved it and can't wait to give it as a baby gift.
customer_reviews.author: FarmersDaughter5858

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret
customer_reviews.text: My baby girl is nine months old and she loves this toy, I originally bought it for her when she was about 6 months old. She loves pressing the buttons and hearing it play music and sounds. She gets excited and starts swinging it in her hands. You should definitely buy this toy for your little one, it works great still, just like on the very first day I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Really great affordable music toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old and my 6 month old both love music and this toy is perfect and easy on the pockets. The songs don't annoy me, the volume choices are pretty ideal, and I love that both of my kids enjoy it. I've bought two of these over the years (the old one I bought 3 years ago STILL works!) And then a 3rd one for my friend having a baby soon. I love this little toy.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Sookiekat

customer_reviews.title: Do not order- doesn’t work and won’t return after a certain date even though it was not used
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my infant grandson for Easter. It would not work when he was finally able to use it even after new batteries were inserted. The window for exchange was closed on June 12 and I am stuck with this useless toy. I thought that your quality and customer service was better than that. I will no longer buy on Amazon unless they can replace a faulty toy.
customer_reviews.author: C. Koch

customer_reviews.title: Beloved Toy
customer_reviews.text: I have bought four of these. I have three kids, my first child who loves music the most wore his first one out. His second one got lost, so we bought another one which lasted until his younger brother was two. Most recently we bought one for our daughter. My oldest son carried it with him everywhere and especially loved it in the car. He still recognizes these melodies and really loves classical music (and Metallica). I will say that the sound quality is better on the quieter of the two settings, but the louder setting is not needed anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Classical Music -- A Beautiful First Toy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for our youngest grandson as a baby gift. Oh my goodness! With the classical music I think I want one for myself. This is a sweet toy that is easy to use and will not irritate the parents (the classical music is beautiful). The flashing colored lights are an added feature that the little ones will enjoy. I just love it! Also, I think the older siblings are going to want to play with it too!
customer_reviews.author: Lori K.

customer_reviews.title: I've purchased this item 3 times since 2015, the 2020 version is much cheaper than the 2015 version.
customer_reviews.text: Back in 2015, this was my oldest son's favorite toy. It lasted forever as he played with it every day. Fast forward to the 2020 version and it's just a much cheaper product. It's lighter and the button has a much cheaper feel to it. This version lasted less than a week of light use before it broke. I hate it when companies do this - make slight changes to products to drive down costs and quality, but still pitch them as the originals that received positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: J. Russell Lyman

customer_reviews.title: Great toy but cheap button
customer_reviews.text: I got this when my baby was 3 months old. She’s now 6 months and this is still one of her favorite toys. The lights and melodies are super cute, there’s only a handful of melodies but she doesn’t seem to care. My only issue is that they make the colorful “button” covered with a colored paper sticker. It’s pretty much worn out for me...idk if I will peel it off if chunks start to come off.
customer_reviews.author: Chenille.5

customer_reviews.title: little one loves it
customer_reviews.text: the LO is 4 months old and I can boldly say this is in her top 3 favorite items to play with. she is easily entertained by the dancing lights and I have seen her on several occasions trying to "catch" the lights. great for tracking as she follows them attentively. also for her motor development. the rattle is an added distraction for her. I use this at home and in the car. I wish the was a way to make the music and lights go on for a length of time. after each song plays out you have to push the button again to restart...but other than that, great buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glorious musical distraction that doesn't make me want to chuck it at the nearest wall.
customer_reviews.text: From newborn to toddler, my kiddo has loved this. Hours in the car whilst stuck in traffic and cold, rainy days stuck indoors have been made content and (dare I say, "happy"?) thanks to this toy. My little ray of sunshine has this item in bed now as a source of entertainment for early morning wake-ups and, once again, I bow before the majesty and might of this simple contraption. Negative note, not water proof, so it may eventually (read also, over one year later) need replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This toy is magic
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what it is about this toy. I got it for our upcoming road trip because of the 11k reviews and figured it had to be something special. Then when I got it, I thought, “This thing only has one button? This isn’t going to entertain her for hours.” Sure enough...my 12 month old LOVED it! She’ll just walk around with it and push that one button over and over and over again. It’s a great take along toy!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl C

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten this for 3 of my 5 kids and each kid has loved it! The music is not short and the lights are entertaining also. It’s easy to use for little ones all the way to toddlers. It is kinda heavy and hard though so when a teeny one lifts it up as they lay on the back it may bob them on the face. All in all my babies have all loved it very much
customer_reviews.author: CDmom5

customer_reviews.title: My grandchild's favorite toy at my house!
customer_reviews.text: My infant grandchild loves this toy!! She loves to chew on the rubbery rings on the handle, and she loves the songs. There is alot of different songs that this toy plays when the button is pushed. Very easy for young babies to push the button. It is a little heavy though. I give this toy 5 stars... and so does my grandbaby!!!
customer_reviews.author: A.C,

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the fact that the picture that was advertised was different than what I got. I only ordered the bundle because the picture/advertisement was of the older version of the take along tunes and to my surprise it came in the mail and was the newer version. I could've just gotten it at a local store, instead I paid extra to include another toy which I didn't want. False advertisement, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dinelli

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - breaks after first few months of use
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old son loves music so we bought him this ... twice. Both times it stopped working after a couple of months - the first baby device we bought that was this poor quality. In addition the scroll button was covered in adhesive that easily comes off with babies teething. Whenever our son would put it in his mouth, he would chew off pieces of the adhesive from the device which is poorly designed for babies. Sadly we are now recycling our second device as it has broken after just 2 months of use. Here's hoping Baby Einstein improves quality in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for calming fussy times!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 month old loves her very hungry caterpillar musical toy, I literally just gave it to her (she gets fussy out of nowhere now that she's teething) and she extended her arms and her face lit up. This little toy is super helpful to calm her whenever she gets fussy and it was a life saver during our road trip to the Midwest, I kept dancing for her to the music ☺, the melodies are just so nice and although she's played it hundred of times, I do not get tired of them. I always carry it in the diaper bag, a must have for every baby parent!
customer_reviews.author: cargru

customer_reviews.title: Durable and entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have purchased two now. I bought one to see if it was sturdy and would be played with. The second one was purchased for another kid. Very sturdy. They have been dropped and banged numerous times. So happy there is a volume. It is nice to be able to turn it down when in different places. kids like that it lights up and flickers with the music. Easy and large enough button for little hands to push.
customer_reviews.author: IrishFlower

customer_reviews.title: Yesss
customer_reviews.text: My 3 month old loves this toy he stares at the lights like he’s mesmerized by them also My hearing is a little damaged but I can hear the toys music clearly! RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Jenns06

customer_reviews.title: ... if I got a dud or if they're all like the one I received but the music is not ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I got a dud or if they're all like the one I received but the music is not very clear at all and has a vibrating noise when it's playing the music. It's so noticeable that it is annoying and distracts from the cute music. I am thinking I should send it back but it seems like a lot of effort for such a cheap little toy. Also, I was giving it to my daughter for Christmas. I'm not sure another one would arrive in time to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver during long road trips when my LO was 4-6 months old. Wasn't really interested in it as a teething device. But loved the music it played. Just like any other toy, after a few months, she lost interest in it. But from time to time she would still get fascinated by it. The only complain I have is, the volume is drastically reduced if it's kept on a surface instead of holding it with hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grows With Your Child
customer_reviews.text: We bought this toy about a year ago for our then-2 month old and it was a hit. He loves the different songs and all the flashing lights. It's now a year later and he still loves it! We ask him to play us his tunes and he goes and gets his Take Along Tunes to jam out. This toy is worth every penny and your child will not grow out of it in just a month or two.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Like Crack for Babies
customer_reviews.text: My first nephew had this toy nine years ago and was mesmerized by it from 3 months to 3 years. Same with my second nephew. I have since bought it for every mom-to-be I know with similar results. My now six-month old cannot. get. enough. I'm purchasing a second one for our diaper bag. The music isn't annoying because they are popular classical pieces and it's pretty unbreakable - ours is dropped on the tile/hardwood floor multiple times a day. Even so, it's $8 for a replacement - worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this toy. The music is fun and not annoying. I completely dislike those “educational” electronic toys that “teach” alphabet, numbers, etc and “55 songs” in annoying “voice.” This toy has s easy to use and just the right size. It has been my grandson’s favorite toy since 6 months and still is at 10 months. He loves to “dance” to the songs and also chews on the beaded handle. Added bonus: I haven’t even had to change the 2 AA batteries that came in it.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Magical Toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old son LOVES this toy. We call it “the magical toy” because anytime he cries, we can show him this toy and he immediately stops crying. He’s learning to hold it himself now and it’s a little heavy for him, but that will come with time. I’d defintely recommend this little toy to other parents/grandparents looking for a simple toy that your child will use for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda T

customer_reviews.title: My favorite baby toy gift
customer_reviews.text: Both of our children were obsessed with this toy. It plays 4 classic music tunes and is triggered by a button that is easy even for a young baby to push. Every time someone we know has a baby, we include this as a gift and we have received several people commenting on how much their babies love it too. It's just a magical baby toy and I can't recommend it highly enough. Keep an eye on the price though. You can get it at most stores (Target, Walmart, Toys R Us) for $6 or so. If Amazon asks for $9-10, just pass. Some of these prices are outrageous.
customer_reviews.author: silly

customer_reviews.title: Musical toy
customer_reviews.text: My baby has not put this down since he’s gotten it! He was always reaching for my phone and now instead he has his own little music toy! It is the perfect size for him to grab and hold onto as well as playing with the beads keep him going for awhile! Perfect for car rides and keeps him busy at home. He loves to watch the lights flash while the music plays and even does a little dance. I love that you can control volume as well as there are several different songs. Dropped it several time and not a problem, very well made. Great find for my little one.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Mihaljevic

customer_reviews.title: Best baby gift!
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for everyone I know that is expecting. The sounds instantly calm and entertain babies of all ages. Even my toddler likes to play with it. I rated it three stars for teething, as none of my babies used it for teething and the beads aren't very soft. This is a must have for babies, and perfect to take in car or during travel.
customer_reviews.author: Sara B.

customer_reviews.title: This is just the cutest!
customer_reviews.text: My grandbaby loves this.......it plays a lot of tunes and lights up......she punches them so much that we never hear the full tune, but at her age, who cares? The music makes her dance/bounce. She doesn't use it for teething, but it fits right into her little hands........she received it when she was around 6 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Carol B.

customer_reviews.title: Paint comes off and is dangerous for kids.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product twice. First one in January, but it kept getting stuck on certain melodies, understandably since it had been dropped many times. No complaints from me. Things break down. So i bought it again, and several days after it arrived, i notice black paint markings all over my daughters face/mouth. I dont know how much of it she ingested, but thankfully she is fine. I’ve attached a picture to show the old one i bought, where the paint is still intact, versus the new one where paint came off. This is completely unacceptable. I am returning this product. Parents, PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS FOR YOUR KIDS.
customer_reviews.author: Lhamo Tsering

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this more stars! I bought it for my granddaughter who loves music. She is 10 months old and can't get enough of it. It has two volumes, perfect for her little hand and the music is fun and ease for her to push the buttons for each tune. The lights are bright and she just stares at it then smiles. It is the perfect gift if you need one. I may just buy another to have as a backup!
customer_reviews.author: DML 59

customer_reviews.title: Great music!
customer_reviews.text: Originally my friend gave me this toy for my grandkids after her kids had loved it. It lasted through all three of the ones I watch so when I got another grandchild out of town I bought one for her. The music is great and the toy is very sturdy. They all loved it from a young age. Easy for them to operate. The only down side might be that it is a little loud right up to the ear.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn N

customer_reviews.title: Three Grandkids, Three music boxes!
customer_reviews.text: My first purchase was 8 years ago. She LOVED it as did parents. Quality sound, volume settings, teaches cause & affect. Parents went through 2 battery changes in 4+ years... then given to friend. Second purchase, 5 years ago. It had to go everywhere she went for at least 3 years, maybe more. Third purchase 1 year ago to grandchild of classical musician parents; he loves it, they love it...the music box seems indestructible.
customer_reviews.author: eric zim

customer_reviews.title: The go-to toy for several situations
customer_reviews.text: While we mostly have stuck with toys that aren't electronic and aren't just buttons, we got this one as an if-all-else-fails distraction for travel. Wasn't expecting our 8-mo-old to fall in love with it. The music is genuinely enjoyable and volume reasonable. Simple, happy lights and easy to handle design. Little one is so delighted with it, the toy nips brewing meltdowns in the bud. Makes taking medicine easier, car rides, etc. Spouse just ordered a back-up, as well as a couple other Baby Einstein toys that might also charm Baby. So many baby toys are grating to adult senses but this one is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Cute and entertaining
customer_reviews.text: My grandson really likes the music and bright flashing lights of this toy. At 3 1/2 months he's too young to grab hold of it although he tries. The only time he can push the buttons is when it's by accident and he hits at it. I think when he can grab and hold it he will really enjoy it. (So 3 months is a little young)
customer_reviews.author: KSS

customer_reviews.title: It's ok. I guess my baby just had no ...
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. I guess my baby just had no interest in it that much. The button should have been raised to accommodate baby pressing it. Maybe an older child would fully appreciate it but my 4 month old did not. Update: My child didn't show much interest at first enjoyed this from about 6months to 16 month old and still plays with it. At that age she could press the button herself. I still think it should be a raised. Iron. It's very durable and has been thrown forcefully from a high chair plenty times. It works like s charm. The middle button has started to fade because it's paper, though. They should make the design all plastic instead.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita Rolle

customer_reviews.title: kid loved this toy
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why kids love certain toys more than others, but my first kid really loved this one. Its great for teething and plays music so maybe that's all he needed. He gummed our first one so much that the sticker on the front came off so we bought another one for the second kid. Batteries last a while and its pretty indestructible. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kbl

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining for many ages
customer_reviews.text: This was the first toy that my daughter ever showed any interest in. Now she'll be two next week and she still plays with this. Today she pulled it out and had it going awhile. The circular sticker on the button was partially ruined long ago as she went through her "put-everything-in-her-mouth" phase, but it still works perfectly and provides entertainment. This toy is definitely good value.
customer_reviews.author: Karbear

customer_reviews.title: THIS is the toy
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months, this is still our kid's favorite toy. It comes everywhere with us. The only damage is to the sticker, because she loves to scratch at it for some reason. The music is pleasant, not too tinny and annoying like a lot of toys. We will likely be buying another when this one dies from the 1000s of times it has been dropped and thrown by a rambunctious 9 month old with a vendetta against my walls.
customer_reviews.author: Burkel

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-sensory toy
customer_reviews.text: My 4.5 month old has really enjoyed this toy so far. She's entranced by the lights and seems to like the music. I'm a fan of the classical tunes it plays, which are more appealing to me than most sounds that come from kid toys. I think this is a toy she'll play with even more as she learns to move the beads on the handle and press the button herself. Another plus for parents--you can control the volume and even turn the music feature off!
customer_reviews.author: Arielle

customer_reviews.title: Cute little toy for babies who love music
customer_reviews.text: My 3 month old loves this toy. If I sit it by him in his swing he moves around so much he accidentally presses the button and gets excited when it plays. He also loves to watch the colorful lights. Imagine he will use it as a teething toy once he gets older and has more control of his hands. Has adjustable volume for when you don’t want it to be too loud in public places.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Purchased a second, both our babies love this!
customer_reviews.text: Our babies love this simple little toy so much, we just purchased a second one. My only criticism is that the rainbow music button is a paper sticker, which our oldest was able to partly scrape off with her bottom teeth. The on/off and volume switch is a must for musical toys, clips of classical music are a nice break from nursery rhymes, and the beaded handle is easy to hold. There are 3 colored lights that blink in sync with the music, and are very eye catching for little ones.
customer_reviews.author: K. Allison

customer_reviews.title: Works great...
customer_reviews.text: My 5 month old loves playing with this toy. Just a touch of the button and the flashing lights and music is a sure distraction for him. The only flaw is the speaker is to the back of the toy, so that when laid flat you can barely hear the music. If you flip it over the music is loud, but you lose the attraction of the colorful button and flashing lights.
customer_reviews.author: KMill

customer_reviews.title: The best toy ever!
customer_reviews.text: Child loved this toy as an infant and later when learned how to push the button to get the sound to change and turn on. Just the best toy to play with music, chew, wave around or do whatever with. The off button is nice too so the sound doesn't play when your alone in a room which can be a little unnerving. Great toy!!! Buy it... you will be happy you did.
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: The best companion and distractor!
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased one of these for my list grandson when he was an infant/toddler. The Baby Einstein went everywhere with him and he used it until it wore out a couple of years later. So now, I just got another one for my 2nd grandson's 1st birthday. He loves it! And the older brother keeps snatching it away from him to play with it himself. The music pieces are his dear old friends.
customer_reviews.author: Khushi

customer_reviews.title: Cute and entraining
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy. Super cute although baby can’t seem to be able to hold it well quite yet. Also I wish the volume was a bit louder. It seems low when you’re in crowds. I wouldn’t think it’s great for teething as all the parts are plastic hard not squishy but my baby does drool all over it though so go figure.
customer_reviews.author: Deimys Vigil

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my niece and it was a great choice. I bought it when she was an infant and she loved the music. It is not overly loud so it’s ok if she plays it over and over. It is well built that now 3 years later my nephew is using it. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JGinTX

customer_reviews.title: Over price for it’s use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when he was 5months old and he didn’t really liked it. I thought it’s nice to have after reading most of the reviews but my baby is nit into it yet. Maybe when he’s older he’ll appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Chicklet

customer_reviews.title: Worn out already buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible item as you can see from the photo the screen/button is already wearing and I’ve only had it just over one month and it’s all scratching off and my baby doesn’t even use it every day how has it worn this badly so fast?!!! Can’t return it either as I’m 4 days out of the window for return! Do not buy this
customer_reviews.author: Gail W

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Toy
customer_reviews.text: For the price, a great little toy. We keep cell phones away from our little one (for now). And we keep this handy (and hidden), so if our little one get's an interest in our phone, we give her this... so she can have a handheld device like mommy and daddy! It hold batteries, so it can be a little heavy, meaning that a head-whack or a drop on the foot has a bit of a punch to it. Two loudness levels is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Badlwin

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it, cute tunes, overall awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This was my son's favorite toy as an infant, and now my daughter loves it too. The tunes are catchy(no words) , they are a good length. Only complaint I have is that my daughter is to small to know to push the button, I do wish there was a setting to keep the sings playing without having to push the button over and over. It's honestly just more of an inconvenience, mostly when driving! Great toy and it has survived 2 babies with no signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren and Donald

customer_reviews.title: My son likes it, ain't it the only thing that matter with these things.
customer_reviews.text: One of my sons favorite toys for a while. Keeps him occupied and likes pressing through all the songs. Sticker peeled off, but that might have been because he was slobbering all over it. Despite many, many drops and throws it has survived and still plays music and flashes it's lights.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great toy with few cons!
customer_reviews.text: This product is smaller than expected but has a good speaker on it. The toy has 4 different songs that do not get annoying! The lights and moving parts make it the perfect distracting toy for car rides and doctor's visits. The down sides to this product are that is smaller than expected but it's okay because it makes it easy for on the go fun! It also only has one button but the sticker surrounding the one button makes it look like maybe you can change the song using the arrows when that is not the case. All in all this is a fantastic toy that my baby loves!
customer_reviews.author: Liberty Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter LOVES this
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my year old granddaughter. It is one of her favorites she goes for each time she visits. Others are hit and miss but this is one she'll play with over and over. The size is perfect for her and it has enough stimulation but isn't overwhelming. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: breezy622

customer_reviews.title: baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: granddaughter is 3 months. She loves this thing. Likes the music and can grab the handle and chew on it. Finally something that can entertain for more than 10 seconds. A friend said it was her son's favorite toy.
customer_reviews.author: sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by our pediatrician
customer_reviews.text: We got this to improve our baby’s tummy time experience (she hated it) on recommendation from her pediatrician & it has worked wonders. It keeps her amused & we’ve tripled our daily tummy time since we started using it. (Baby is 3 months for reference). Videos keep her amused too but I wanted an alternative to screen time.
customer_reviews.author: BrittneySM

customer_reviews.title: Great songs
customer_reviews.text: Love the songs. Volume control? The speaker is on one side only so depending on which side is up determines your volume. For teething there isn’t much on it that the one year old can actually get in his mouth. But I bought it for the music and the songs are long and he loves listening to them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap sticker
customer_reviews.text: The front button is covered by a giant sticker that has started to come off in bits and pieces, most likely into my baby's mouth. Not sure why they added a paper sticker that disintegrates when babies chew on it. I tried removing the sticker but it does not come off cleanly. I don't feel comfortable letting my baby have this toy since she will eventually eat the entire sticker off!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Not very engaging.
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute, it’s portable, but it didn’t really get the child’s attention much. Makes a wonderful clatter when the baby lets go of it. Just don’t know how much of that “game” the toy can take. Maybe when Baby is a little older and understands it more, it’ll be more interesting?
customer_reviews.author: Diane Frangie

product_meta.title: Baby Einstein Take Along Tunes Musical Toy, Ages 3 months +
product_meta.description:
Baby Einstein Take Along Tunes

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Promote music appreciation and auditory development by introducing your little one to baby-friendly versions of classical masterpieces by Mozart, Vivaldi, Chopin and Rossini with the Baby Einstein take along Tunes. A large, easy to press button allows your baby to toggle through 7 high quality and enjoyable classical melodies at home, or for on-the-go fun. This baby's version of an MP3 player has colorful lights that dance across the screen to enhance each entertaining melody and promote visual perception.
feature_bullets: A best selling favorite with thousands of 5 star ratings
Inspires a lifelong love of music
Baby can switch between 10 total melodies
Perfectly sized for ages 3 to 36 months
Volume control is music to mom & dad’s ears
Easy to wipe down and clean

specifications.Care instructions: Wipe clean with damp cloth and mild soap. Do not immerse in water.
specifications.Additional product features: Music, Sound & Lights, Volume Control, Easy to Clean
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars20,101 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
